basic.description: In this course, students learn the basics of classical and solution thermodynamics. The course forms the link between the mass and energy balance courses, and separations.
basic.subject: ECH
basic.title: Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ECH 3023, ECH 3024, and ECH 3301, all with a grade of "C" or higher; and PHY 2049C. Corequisites: ECH 3266 and ECH 3854.
